props.name: query
props.description: Please use $1, $2, etc. for parameterized queries to avoid SQL injection.

props.name: args
props.description: Arguments to be used in the query

props.name: query_timeout
props.description: An integer indicating the maximum number of milliseconds to wait for a query to complete before timing out.

props.name: connection_timeout_ms
props.description: An integer indicating the maximum number of milliseconds to wait for a connection to be established before timing out.

props.name: application_name
props.description: A string indicating the name of the client application connecting to the server.

new-row.description: triggered when a new row is added

props.name: order_by
props.description: Use something like a created timestamp or an auto-incrementing ID.
